Extrude the 3D sketch by 0.075 units towards the negative normal direction, producing the curved side of the prism. Note: The curved rectangle is created by combining two arcs and two lines. The arcs have a center at [0.375, 0.1125], a start point at [0.75, 0.0] and [0.0, 0.225], and an end point at [0.75, 0.225] and [0.0, 0.0]. The two arcs are connected by two lines, which form a straight line with a length of 0.225 units. The overall length of the curved rectangle is 0.75 units, and the width is 0.075 units. The height of the curved rectangle is 0.5 units.</description>
